dt-example.title: Viewing Totals, Subtotals and Cascading Panes
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example demonstrates the `-init searchPanes.cascadePanes` feature working alongside the `-init searchPanes.viewTotal` feature. Cascading panes allow the panes to be filtered based on the values selected in the other panes.
Both `-init searchPanes.cascadePanes` and `-init searchPanes.viewTotal` are `false` by default.
